param.name: query
param.value: PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ca.mendoza968/ontologies/services#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT ?method ?propertyName (group_concat(?bodyLabel) as ?bodyLabels) (group_concat(?dataTypeLabel) as ?dataTypes) WHERE { ?service :aboutProperty ?property; :hasMethod ?method . ?property rdfs:label ?propertyName . ?method :hasBodyField ?bodyField . ?bodyField rdfs:label ?bodyLabel; :hasDataType ?dataType . ?dataType rdfs:label ?dataTypeLabel . } GROUP BY ?method ?propertyName

param.name: query
param.value: PREFIX : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ca.mendoza968/ontologies/iotdevices#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT ?deviceID ?propertyName (group_concat(?bodyLabel) as ?bodyLabels) (group_concat(?dataTypeLabel) as ?dataTypes) WHERE { ?device :hasMeasurementCapability ?measurementCapability; :hasDeviceId ?deviceID . ?measurementCapability a :MeasurementCapability . ?measurementCapability :forProperty ?property; :hasBodyField ?bodyField . ?property rdfs:label ?propertyName . ?bodyField rdfs:label ?bodyLabel; :hasDataType ?dataType . ?dataType rdfs:label ?dataTypeLabel . } GROUP BY ?deviceID ?propertyName
